original_text:
Book of Muertitos
Festeggia Halloween tutto l’anno con la slot Book of Muertitos di Spearhead. Scopri come attivare il round bonus e vincere 10 giri gratis nei nostri casino!
Book of Muertitos
Spearhead Studios festeggia “Il Giorno dei morti”, una tradizione celebrata in tutto il Messico, con una rinomata festa colorata nella slot “Book of Muertitos”, con 5 rulli e 10 linee di pagamento fisse. In questa slot dal formato standard, quando si attiva la funzione Free Spin potrai ottenere simboli Scatter in grado di regalarti interessanti moltiplicatori.
Tutti i giocatori hanno la possibilità di testare la slot in modalità demo gratuita, accedendo da tutti i dispositivi desktop, tablet e mobile.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
“Muertitos”, in italiano “Morti”, resta legato al tema ambientando il gioco base in un cimitero durante il giorno mentre durante il round Bonus si trasforma in una festa notturna ricca di luci. Il festival “Dias de los muertos” ricorda tutti morti in modo festoso, quindi l’aspetto della slot machine è colorato, con una colonna sonora allegra.
Tra i simboli ci sono le classiche carte da gioco (10, J, Q, K, A) dal valore minore e i simboli speciali (personaggi quali Pedro Mora e Rosario Escarlata) che pagheranno da 250x a 1000x la tua puntata se ne compariranno 5 nello stesso momento. L’icona del Libro funge da Wild e da Scatter e può comparire su qualsiasi rullo.
La puntata minima è di 0,10€ per giro mentre quella massima è di 100€ e l’RTP è del 96,04%.
Simboli e funzionalità
Nella slot Book of Muertitos potrai attivare la funzione Free Spin e vincere 10 Giri Gratis nel momento in cui atterreranno 3 Wild sulla stessa linea. Prima che il Bonus entri in funzione verrà assegnato un simbolo a caso con la funzione di simbolo in espansione nel corso di tutto il round bonus.
Potrai ottenere moltiplicatori da 1x fino ad un moltiplicatore massimo di 27x la puntata totale.
Considerazioni finali sulla slot “Book of Muertitos” 
Si tratta di una slot colorata e divertente, ad alta volatilità in cui troverai un entusiasmante simbolo in espansione durante il round Bonus e un moltiplicatore in grado di aumentare le tue vincite rendendo il fioco davvero divertente.
FAQ – Domande frequenti su Book of Muertitos
È prevista una funzione bonus all’interno della slot Book of Muertitos?
Sì! Fai atterrare almeno 3 icone Wild/Scatter sulla stessa linea e attiverai la funzione Bonus che ti regalerà 10 Free Spin.
È possibile riattivare i Free Spin?
Sfortunatamente no! Una volta attivato il round bonus dei 10 Free Spin devi riuscire ad ottenere interessanti moltiplicatori grazie al simbolo Wild.
Quali sono l’RTP e la varianza di Book of Muertitos? 
L’RTP di Book of Muertitos si attesta al 96.04% e la varianza è alta. Vuol dire che le vincite sono elevate ma bisogna attendere un po’ per ottenerle.
Quali sono i simboli speciali della slot Book of Muertitos?
Troverai un simbolo Wild che funziona anche come Scatter. È rappresentato da un libro e può sostituire i simboli adiacenti.

raw_translation.response:
Book of Muertitos
Celebrate Halloween all year round with the slot game Book of Muertitos by Spearhead. Discover how to activate the bonus round and win 10 free spins in our casinos!

Book of Muertitos
Spearhead Studios celebrates "The Day of the Dead," a tradition celebrated throughout Mexico, with a renowned colorful party in the slot game "Book of Muertitos", with 5 reels and 10 fixed paylines. In this standard format slot, when the Free Spin feature is activated, you can get Scatter symbols that can give you interesting multipliers.

All players have the chance to try out the slot game for free in demo mode, accessible from all desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

Main Features of the Slot Machine
"Muertitos", meaning "Dead", remains true to the theme of setting the base game in a cemetery during the day while during the Bonus round it transforms into a nighttime festival full of lights. The "Dias de los muertos" festival celebrates the memory of all the deceased in a festive manner, so the appearance of the slot machine is colorful, with a cheerful soundtrack.

Among the symbols, there are the classic playing cards (10, J, Q, K, A) of lesser value and the special symbols (characters such as Pedro Mora and Rosario Escarlata) that pay from 250x to 1000x your bet if they appear 5 at the same time. The Book icon functions as a Wild and Scatter and can appear on any reel.

The minimum bet is €0.10 per spin, while the maximum bet is €100 and the RTP is 96.04%.

Symbols and Features
In the Book of Muertitos slot game, you can activate the Free Spin feature and win 10 free spins when 3 Wilds land on the same line. Before the Bonus enters into action, a symbol will be randomly assigned with an expanding symbol function throughout the Bonus round.

You can get multipliers from 1x up to a maximum multiplier of 27x your total bet.

Final Thoughts on the "Book of Muertitos" Slot Machine
It is a colorful and fun slot game with high volatility where you will find an exciting expanding symbol during the Bonus round and a multiplier that can increase your winnings, making the game truly entertaining.

FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions about the Book of Muertitos Slot Game
Is a bonus feature included in the Book of Muertitos slot game?
Yes! Land at least 3 Wild/Scatter icons on the same line and activate the Bonus feature that will give you 10 free spins.

Can Free Spins be reactivated?
Unfortunately, no! Once the 10 Free Spins Bonus round is activated, you must try to get interesting multipliers thanks to the Wild symbol.

What is the RTP and variance of the Book of Muertitos?
The RTP of Book of Muertitos is 96.04% and the variance is high. This means that the winnings are high but it takes a while to get them.

What are the special symbols of the Book of Muertitos slot game?
You will find a Wild symbol that also functions as a Scatter. It is represented by a book and can replace adjacent symbols.

Book of Muertitos
Spearhead Studios celebrates "The Day of the Dead," a tradition celebrated throughout Mexico, with a renowned colorful party in the slot game "Book of Muertitos", with 5 reels and 10 fixed paylines. In this standard format slot, when the Free Spin feature is activated, you can get Scatter symbols that can give you interesting multipliers.

All players have the chance to try out the slot game for free in demo mode, accessible from all desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

Main Features of the Slot Machine
"Muertitos", meaning "Dead", remains true to the theme of setting the base game in a cemetery during the day while during the Bonus round it transforms into a nighttime festival full of lights. The "Dias de los muertos" festival celebrates the memory of all the deceased in a festive manner, so the appearance of the slot machine is colorful, with a cheerful soundtrack.

Among the symbols, there are the classic playing cards (10, J, Q, K, A) of lesser value and the special symbols (characters such as Pedro Mora and Rosario Escarlata) that pay from 250x to 1000x your bet if they appear 5 at the same time. The Book icon functions as a Wild and Scatter and can appear on any reel.

The minimum bet is €0.10 per spin, while the maximum bet is €100 and the RTP is 96.04%.

Symbols and Features
In the Book of Muertitos slot game, you can activate the Free Spin feature and win 10 free spins when 3 Wilds land on the same line. Before the Bonus enters into action, a symbol will be randomly assigned with an expanding symbol function throughout the Bonus round.

You can get multipliers from 1x up to a maximum multiplier of 27x your total bet.

Final Thoughts on the "Book of Muertitos" Slot Machine
It is a colorful and fun slot game with high volatility where you will find an exciting expanding symbol during the Bonus round and a multiplier that can increase your winnings, making the game truly entertaining.

FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions about the Book of Muertitos Slot Game
Is a bonus feature included in the Book of Muertitos slot game?
Yes! Land at least 3 Wild/Scatter icons on the same line and activate the Bonus feature that will give you 10 free spins.

Can Free Spins be reactivated?
Unfortunately, no! Once the 10 Free Spins Bonus round is activated, you must try to get interesting multipliers thanks to the Wild symbol.

What is the RTP and variance of the Book of Muertitos?
The RTP of Book of Muertitos is 96.04% and the variance is high. This means that the winnings are high but it takes a while to get them.

What are the special symbols of the Book of Muertitos slot game?
You will find a Wild symbol that also functions as a Scatter. It is represented by a book and can replace adjacent symbols.
